scripts.watch: watchify source/index.js -p [ urify-emitter -l 100 -o public/browser -b public/browser ] --it urify -p [ browserify-livereload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 1337 ] -o public/browser/bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run www
scripts.build: browserify -p [ urify-emitter -l 100 -o public/browser -b public/browser ] --it urify source/index.js > public/browser/bundle.js
